function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-Coronavirus-2 RNA in sewage","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through sewage contamination","Mitigation":"Implementing strict sewage treatment and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Advanced sewage treatment and disinfection systems","People":"General public, wastewater treatment workers","Owner":"Local authorities, sewage treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Volumes processed in RNA extraction","Impact":"Risk of exposure to viral RNA during extraction process","Mitigation":"Implementing proper safety protocols and personal protective equipment for lab workers","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, PPE, safety training","People":"Lab workers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratories"}]}
